name: Ing 💕
greetingText: The best girlfriend i ever had 👧🏻
wishText: My cutie pumpkin, you are the love of my life and I hope your birthday brings you happiness and everything you have been wishing for!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! I hope you feel nothing but love today. You fill me with so much happiness and I am so lucky to have such a wonderful partner in my life 😚
text2: You really are the most supportive and carring gf anyone could ask for 💑🏻
text3: Love you tee sud nai lokkk <3 <3 <3, but ...
text4: I realised, I wanted to say something 😟
replayText: LOVE NONG ING MORE EACH DAY
